languages.text: {n}Окруженный отгоняющими зло знаками, труп Зари кажется маленьким островом мрачности в торжественном океане готовящегося Триумфа. Над телом, видно, поработали люди губернатора, защитив от разложения и срезав пилой с лица жуткую железную маску.{/n}

{n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse looks like a tiny island of gloom in the glorious ocean of your impending Triumph. The governor's people must have put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay as well as sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Окруженный отгоняющими зло знаками, труп Зари кажется маленьким островом мрачности в торжественном океане готовящегося Триумфа. Над телом, видно, поработали люди губернатора, защитив от разложения и срезав пилой с лица жуткую железную маску.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse is like a tiny island of gloom amid the glorious ocean of your upcoming Triumph. The governor's people must've put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay and sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

{n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse is like a tiny island of gloom amid the glorious ocean of your upcoming Triumph. The governor's people must've put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay and sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

{n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse looks like a tiny island of gloom in the glorious ocean of your impending Triumph. The governor's people must have put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay as well as sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auroras Leiche ist umgeben von Emblemen, die das Böse abwehren sollen. sie wirkt wie eine einzige Insel der Düsternis im glorreichen Ozean deines kommenden Triumphs. Die Leute des Gouverneurs müssen viel Arbeit investiert haben, um die Leiche vor dem Verfall zu bewahren und die düstere eiserne Gesichtsmaske abzusägen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse looks like a tiny island of gloom in the glorious ocean of your impending Triumph. The governor's people must have put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay as well as sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auroras Leiche ist umgeben von Emblemen, die das Böse abwehren sollen. sie wirkt wie eine einzige Insel der Düsternis im glorreichen Ozean deines kommenden Triumphs. Die Leute des Gouverneurs müssen viel Arbeit investiert haben, um die Leiche vor dem Verfall zu bewahren und die düstere eiserne Gesichtsmaske abzusägen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entouré d'emblèmes destinés à repousser le mal, le cadavre d'Aurore ressemble à un petit îlot de morosité au milieu de l'océan glorieux de votre triomphe à venir. Les hommes du gouverneur ont dû déployer de grands efforts pour protéger le corps de la décomposition et pour scier le masque de fer sinistre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse looks like a tiny island of gloom in the glorious ocean of your impending Triumph. The governor's people must have put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay as well as sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entouré d'emblèmes destinés à repousser le mal, le cadavre d'Aurore ressemble à un petit îlot de morosité au milieu de l'océan glorieux de votre triomphe à venir. Les hommes du gouverneur ont dû déployer de grands efforts pour protéger le corps de la décomposition et pour scier le masque de fer sinistre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在邪恶徽记的簇拥下，“极光”的尸体看起来就像凯旋巡礼辉煌海洋中的一座昏暗小岛。总督的人肯定花了不少精力保存这具尸体免受腐烂影响，尸体上可怕的铁面具也被锯掉了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse looks like a tiny island of gloom in the glorious ocean of your impending Triumph. The governor's people must have put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay as well as sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在邪恶徽记的簇拥下，‘极光’的尸体看起来就像凯旋巡礼辉煌海洋中的一座昏暗小岛。总督的人肯定花了不少精力保存这具尸体免受腐烂影响，尸体上可怕的铁面具也被锯掉了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}悪しき不快な紋章に囲まれたオーロラの死体は、まるでこれから凱旋する輝かしい海の上の暗く小さな島のようだ。総督の従者は多くの労力を費やして、腐敗から体を守り、恐ろしい鉄の仮面を切断したに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse looks like a tiny island of gloom in the glorious ocean of your impending Triumph. The governor's people must have put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay as well as sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}悪しき不快な紋章に囲まれたオーロラの死体は、まるでこれから凱旋する輝かしい海の上の暗く小さな島のようだ。総督の従者は多くの労力を費やして、腐敗から体を守り、恐ろしい鉄の仮面を切断したに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rodeado de emblemas que repelen el mal, el cadáver de Aurora parece una pequeña isla de penumbra en el glorioso océano de tu inminente triunfo. La gente del gobernador debe haber trabajado mucho para proteger el cuerpo de la descomposición, así como para cortar la máscara de hierro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse looks like a tiny island of gloom in the glorious ocean of your impending Triumph. The governor's people must have put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay as well as sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rodeado de emblemas que repelen el mal, el cadáver de Aurora parece una pequeña isla de penumbra en el glorioso océano de tu próximo triunfo. La gente del gobernador debe haber trabajado mucho para proteger el cuerpo de la descomposición, así como para cortar la máscara de hierro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aurora'nın şer kovucu simgelerle kaplı cesedi, yaklaşan Zafer Alayı'nın görkemli okyanusunda belli belirsiz bir kasvet adası âdeta. Valinin adamları, cesedin çürümemesi ve demirden yüz maskesini kesip çıkarmak için epey çaba sarf etmiş olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by evil-repelling emblems, Aurora's corpse looks like a tiny island of gloom in the glorious ocean of your impending Triumph. The governor's people must have put a lot of work into protecting the body from decay as well as sawing off the grim iron face mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aurora'nın şerden koruyan amblemlerle kaplı cesedi, ihtişamlı Zafer Alayı'nın ortasında sergilendikçe acınası bir hâlde âdeta ezilip büzülüyor. Valinin adamları, cesedin çürümemesi ve demir yüz maskesini kesip çıkarmak için epey çaba sarf etmiş olmalı.{/n}
